LanguageData.DissectionNoPassion.stages.0.label: Desecrated corpse
LanguageData.DissectionNoPassion.stages.0.description: I dismembered a dead corpse - gross.
LanguageData.DissectionPassion.stages.0.label: Dissected corpse
LanguageData.DissectionPassion.stages.0.description: I dissected a dead body and the knowledge gained will help us to survive.
